page.title: 02BERRY'S GARDEN CENTRE
page.content: BERRY'S IS SITUATED OFF THE A38 IN HIGHBRIDGE.IT HAS EXSISTED FOR TWENTY- FIVE YEARS. THERE ARE THREE SECTIONS TO BERRY'S,THERE IS A GARDEN CENTRE,D.I.Y AND GREENHOUSE'S AND SHED AREA. THIRTEEN TO FIFTEEN PEOPLE ARE EMPLOYED AT BERRY'S.THE COMPANY IS NOT EXPANDING TO OTHER PARTS OF THE COUNTRY. THEY SELL A WIDE RANGE OF GOODS. SATURDAY AND SUNDAY ARE THE BUSIEST DAY'S OF THE WEEK.THAT IS BECAUSE ON SATURDAY AND SUNDAY NOT AS MANY PEOPLE ARE AT WORK. BERRY'S ARE THE ONLY GARDEN CENTRE IN THE AREA WHICH ALLOW CREDIT CARDS. BERRY'S LOOK'S AS IF IT HAS A GOOD FUTURE AHEAD.
